name: population_warmup
hypothesis: Two-phase sigma schedule: explore broadly then refine locally within CMA-ES budget.

prior_evidence.sigma_ladder: FAILED - Sigma scheduling interferes with CMA-ES covariance learning

abort_reason: Prior evidence (sigma_ladder) conclusively shows sigma scheduling interferes with CMA-ES covariance adaptation. This experiment would repeat a known failure.

conclusions.finding: Sigma scheduling is theoretically unsound for CMA-ES - interferes with covariance adaptation
conclusions.recommendation: Do not pursue sigma schedule modifications. CMA-ES internal adaptation is optimal.
